name: Lead Address
script:
address_title=frappe.form_dict["address_title"]
address_line1=frappe.form_dict["address_line1"]
address_line2=frappe.form_dict["address_line2"]
area=frappe.form_dict["area"]
city=frappe.form_dict["city"]
state=frappe.form_dict["state"]

name=frappe.form_dict["name"]

title=address_title+"-Billing"

a = frappe.get_doc({"doctype":"Address","address_title":address_title,"address_line1":address_line1,"address_line2":address_line2,"city":city, "area":area,
"state":state})

a.insert()

parent = frappe.get_doc('Address', title)
parent.append("links", {
    'link_doctype': 'Lead',
    'link_name': name,
    # 'link_title':'Sahil Patel'
    
})
parent.save()
frappe.db.commit()

name: Email Validation For Supplier
User Number Fetch
Inquiry Form for CRM
script: request = frappe.form_dict["request"]fname = frappe.form_dict["fname"]lname = frappe.form_dict['lname']email = frappe.form_dict["email"]mobile_no = frappe.form_dict["mobile"]company = frappe.form_dict["company"]notes = frappe.form_dict["notes"]equip = frappe.form_dict['equipment']dt = frappe.form_dict["date"]wp = frappe.form_dict['watsappno']lead_source = frappe.form_dict['inquiry_source']leadup = ""check_opp = ""opportunity = ""list1=""customeropp = ""cust = ""op = ""customer = frappe.db.sql("select customer_name from `tabCustomer` where whatsapp_no = %s OR phone=%s ",(mobile_no,mobile_no))dk2 = frappe.db.sql("select name from `tabLead` where status != 'Converted' AND status != 'Opportunity' AND email_id = %s" ,email)dk3 = frappe.db.sql("select name from `tabLead` where email_id=%s ",email )dk = frappe.db.sql("select name from `tabLead` where status = 'Converted' AND email_id=%s ",email )for a1 in dk2:    for b1 in a1:        if leadup=="":            leadup=b1            for a1 in dk3:    for b1 in a1:        if check_opp=="":            check_opp=b1            for i in dk:    for j in i:        if list1=="":            list1=jfor c in customer:    for d in c:        if cust=="":            cust = dif leadup != "":        # frappe.msgprint("lead update")    doc1 = frappe.get_doc('Lead', leadup)    doc1.append('equipment_inquiry', {       'equipment_name': equip,        'request_type':request,        'inquiry_date':dt    })    doc1.save()    frappe.db.commit()      frappe.msgprint("Lead is Updated")    elif cust != "":    data = frappe.new_doc("Opportunity")    data.opportunity_from = "Customer"    data.party_name = cust    data.save()        doc12 = frappe.get_doc('Opportunity', data.name)    doc12.append('equipment_inquiry', {        'equipment_name': equip,         'request_type':request,        'inquiry_date':dt    })    doc12.save()     frappe.db.commit()    frappe.msgprint("Customer's Opportunity is Created")    elif check_opp != "":     dataop = frappe.new_doc("Opportunity")     dataop.opportunity_from = "Lead"     dataop.party_name = check_opp     dataop.save()     doc3 = frappe.get_doc('Opportunity', dataop.name)     doc3.append('equipment_inquiry', {       'equipment_name': equip,        'request_type':request,        'inquiry_date':dt     })     doc3.save()     frappe.db.commit()     frappe.msgprint("New Opportunity is Create")      else:        data2 = frappe.new_doc("Lead")    data2.request=request    data2.first_name=fname    data2.last_name = lname    data2.email_id = email    data2.mobile_no = mobile_no    data2.company_name = company    data2.supplier_notes = notes    data2.whatsapp_no = wp    data2.source= lead_source            data2.save()        doc2 = frappe.get_doc('Lead', data2.name)    doc2.append('equipment_inquiry', {       'equipment_name': equip,        'request_type':request,        'inquiry_date':dt        })    doc2.save()    frappe.db.commit()    frappe.msgprint("New Lead is created")      # frappe.msgprint("worked")

name: Website Item
script:
# frappe.msgprint("Hello")
name=frappe.form_dict["name"]
item_group=frappe.form_dict["item_group"]
price=frappe.form_dict["standard_rate"]
maker_model=frappe.form_dict["maker_model"]
vehicle_class=frappe.form_dict["vehicle_class"]
owner_count=frappe.form_dict["owner_count"]
model=frappe.form_dict["model"]
sub=frappe.form_dict["sub"]
fitness_dt=frappe.form_dict["fitness_dt"]
insurance_date=frappe.form_dict["insurance_date"]
manufacturing_date=frappe.form_dict["manufacturing_date"]
registration_date=frappe.form_dict["registration_date"]
equipment_condition=frappe.form_dict["equipment_condition"]
equipment_current_reading=frappe.form_dict["equipment_current_reading"]
location=frappe.form_dict["location"]
short_description=frappe.form_dict["short_description"]
description=frappe.form_dict["description"]
img1 = frappe.form_dict["img1"]
img2 = frappe.form_dict["img2"]
img3 = frappe.form_dict["img3"]
img4 = frappe.form_dict["img4"]
img5 = frappe.form_dict["img5"]
img6 = frappe.form_dict["img6"]



list1=[img1,img2,img3,img4,img5,img6]

d=frappe.db.sql("""select supplier from `tabItem` where name=%s""",name)
list11 = ""           
for i in d:
    for j in i:
        if list11=="":
            list11=j
# frappe.msgprint(list1)
dd = frappe.db.sql("""select mobile_number from `tabSupplier` where name=%s""",list11)
list2 = []     
for ii in dd:
    for jj in ii:
        if list2==[]:
            list2=jj
            
ddd = frappe.db.sql("""select supplier_name from `tabSupplier` where name=%s""",list11)
list3 = ""     
for iii in ddd:
    for jjj in iii:
        if list3=="":
            list3=jjj     

a = frappe.get_doc({"doctype":"Web item","web_item_name":sub,"item_code":name,"item_name":name,"description":name, "item_group":item_group, "price":price,
"maker_model":maker_model,"vehicle_class":vehicle_class,"owner_count":owner_count,"model":model,"fitness_dt":fitness_dt,"insurance_date":insurance_date,
"website_image":img1,"manufacturing_date":manufacturing_date,"registration_date":registration_date, "equipment_current_reading":equipment_current_reading,
"equipment_condition":equipment_condition,"location":location,"short_description":short_description,"description":description,"supplier_name":list3,"supplier_number":list2})

a.insert()

frappe.db.commit()

doc = frappe.get_doc('Web item', a.name)
for i in list1:
    doc.append('web_item_slide_show', {
    'image': i,
        #  'request_type':request
    })


    doc.save()
    frappe.db.commit()
frappe.db.commit()
frappe.msgprint("Web Item Create")

script:
address_line1=frappe.form_dict["address_line1"]
address_line2=frappe.form_dict["address_line2"]

city=frappe.form_dict["city"]

pincode=frappe.form_dict["pincode"]

a = frappe.get_doc({"doctype":"Address","address_title":name,"address_line1":address_line1,"address_line2":address_line2,"city":city, "area":area,
"state":state ,"pincode":pincode})

    # 'link_title':'Sahil Patel'
    
})

name: get_customer_wise_sheet
script:
a=frappe.form_dict["from_time"]
b=frappe.form_dict["to_time"]
name1=frappe.form_dict["name"]
c=frappe.form_dict["equipment"]
d=frappe.form_dict["customer"]
ff=str(a)
tt=str(b)
name= frappe.db.sql("""SELECT name FROM `tabLog Sheet` WHERE  equipment=%s AND customer=%s AND date BETWEEN %s AND %s """,(c,d,ff,tt))

frappe.msgprint(str(name))
nm=[]
for i in name:
    for j in i:
        nm.append(j)
        
equip= frappe.db.sql("""SELECT equipment FROM `tabLog Sheet` WHERE docstatus = 1 AND equipment=%s AND customer=%s AND date BETWEEN %s AND %s """,(c,d,ff,tt))
eq=[]
for i in equip:
    for j in i:
        eq.append(j)
var=str(eq)
frappe.msgprint(var)
new = 0

doc1 = frappe.get_doc('Sales Invoice', name1)

while new < len(nm):
   
    doc1.append('log_sheet_details', {
       
                "log_sheet":nm[new],
    })
    
 
    doc1.save()
    new1=str(new)
   
    new=new+1
    frappe.db.commit()

name: Sales Order Wise Item Filter on Resource Planning
Web Item Status Change
script:
a=frappe.form_dict["name"]
b=frappe.form_dict["status"]
price=frappe.form_dict["price"]
equipment_current_reading=frappe.form_dict["equipment_current_reading"]
c = int(b)

if c==0:
    # frappe.msgprint(b)
    frappe.db.set_value("Web item",a,"item_status","Unpublish")
if c==1:
    # frappe.msgprint(b)
    frappe.db.set_value("Web item",a,"item_status","Publish")
    

frappe.db.set_value("Web item",a,"price",price)
frappe.db.set_value("Web item",a,"equipment_current_reading",equipment_current_reading)
